name: 9th Annual Global Conference on Engineering and Technology (GCOET) 2021 in Penang, Malaysia
content: Contemporary Issues in Engineering & Technology Research The conference will cover important issues in Engineering and Technology under various sub-themes. The goal of our conference is also to support, encourage and provide a platform for young researchers to present their research, to network within the international community of other young researchers and to seek the insight and advice of successful senior researchers during the conference.

full: PARKROYAL Penang Resort Batu Ferringhi Beach
location.city: PARKROYAL Penang Resort Batu Ferringhi Beach

organizers: Global Academy of Training and Research
